RecruitPostName: IEG/Lightspeed - Senior Technical Designer
Responsibility:
Responsibilities

As an Open World Technical Designer at Lightspeed LA, you will be the liaison between the World Design and Engineering teams. You will be working with multi-disciplinary teams to optimize designer workflow, processes, and content pipeline.  You will engage in complex technical areas such as AI, physics, animation, UI, and data management.  As part of the Design team, you will be the go-to person for the implementation of complex scripted content that stretches the capability of open world systems and breathes life into the ambient world US-Irvine
Requirement:
Required Skills

5+ years of proven game design and scripting experience in a professional environment.
A strong desire for solving complex technical and creative problems
A good understanding of object-oriented programming patterns.
Assume responsibility for scripting intricate content and systems
Set the bar for the design department’s implementation of scripted content


Preferred Qualifications

Technical Degree (CS, IT, SE, CE, or equivalent work experience) is a plus
Multiple programming languages: one of C/C++/C#/Java to a reasonable knowledge
Ability to drive problem solving by predicting problems, producing test cases, and implementing fixes in systems and tools
Strong experience with Visual Scripting languages (Kismet, Blueprint, etc.)
A deep understanding of how open world systems affect gameplay

RecruitPostName: WXG12-WeChat Data Scientist
Responsibility:
About Tencent
Tencent is an Internet-based platform company founded in Shenzhen, China, in 1998. We use technology to enrich the lives of Internet users and assist the digital upgrade of enterprises. Our mission is "Value for Users, Tech for Good". We embrace a culture of teamwork & creativity and are driven by our values - Integrity, Proactivity, Collaboration and Creativity.

We are rapidly expanding our international operations and are looking for top talent to propel us forward. Combining the results-oriented nature of a start-up with the resources of a profitable and leading Internet company, Tencent offers a unique opportunity for aspiring individuals to thrive.

About WeChat
With over 1.2 billion users worldwide, WeChat is changing the mobile landscape by connecting people, services, and businesses in China and around-the world. The WeChat team in Singapore is responsible for managing and growing our core product including messaging and social networking for users around the world.

Join the WeChat team and play an impactful role in keeping people around the world connected, help redefine how people use their mobile devices to communicate and interact online and to better understand user behaviour and preferences of users worldwide.

Roles & Responsibilities
•	To look into both qualitative and quantitative data sets, perform analysis to derive problems and to build solutions through the use of machine learning and deep learning approaches
•	Collect large sets of structured and unstructured data from independent sources, cleaning and validating the data to ensure accuracy, completeness, and uniformity	
•	Analyzing the data to identify patterns or trends via Machine Learning, Deep Learning models to look for actionable insights, potential opportunities and/or threats to WeChat ecosystem
•	Interpreting the data to discover solutions or opportunities and building a story-board to communicate such insights to the business for actions
Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Mathematics, Economics, Statistics, Data Science, Computer Vision or similar quantitative field
•	Ability to communicate complex ideas to non-technical stakeholders in a way they can easily understand and appreciate.
•	Good knowledge of Python or C/C++ programming language
•	Self-driven, innovative, collaborative, with good communication and presentation skills, able to translate between business and technical audiences
•	Fluency in both English and Mandarin to deal with international stakeholders and stakeholders who are based in HQ

RecruitPostName: 25927-Performance Analysis Engineer
Responsibility:
Job Description
As part of QA team，you will play the key role of game performance testing and analysis, making sure the team have the ability to help development team optimizing game performance, figuring out the performance problems of the games and giving efficacious solutions. Multiple 3A games on PC and Consoles are on the way!

What you will do：
1. Construct the performance testing and analysis frame for the team, enable the team on game performance analysis, on platforms both PC and consoles.
2. Collaborate with the development team to understand the whole structure of the  games
3. Take the ownership of game client performance analysis, performance testing tool development(if necessary)
Requirement:
What you bring：
1. 8+ years of experience in game performance testing and performance analysis(client side)
2. Strong knowledge of gaming platforms, both PC and consoles
3. Strong knowledge of GPU rendering analysis（both AMD and Nvidia will be better) and CPU bottleneck analysis, excellent skills in CPU and GPU limitation analyzing, along with debugging and troubleshooting abilities
4. Have the experience in developing testing tools and testing scripts, in any of the following: C/C++, java, python
5. Have a good understanding of game development engines, eg. Unity, Unreal or other engines.
